title: A crevv of kind gossips, all met to be merrie complayning of their husbands, with their husbands ansvveres in their owne defence. Written, and newly inlarged by S.R.
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: Printed by W. W[hite] for Iohn Deane, and are to be sold at his shoppe at Temple-barre,
notes: An edition of: Rowlands, Samuel.  A whole crew of kind gossips, all met to be merry.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
